mapper.select: select * from Pet where customer_Index = #{ customer_Index }
mapper.insert: insert into Pet (pet_Index, customer_Index, pet_Name, pet_Type, pet_Gender, pet_Age, pet_IsNeutralized, pet_Weight, pet_History) values(#{ pet_Index }, #{ customer_Index }, #{pet_Name}, #{pet_Type}, #{pet_Gender}, #{pet_Age}, #{pet_IsNeutralized}, #{pet_Weight}, #{pet_History})
mapper.delete: delete from Pet where pet_Index = #{ pet_Index }
